head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BOLDUC, REV. MONSIGNOR NORMAN P. JR.

identified-content.person: BOLDUC, REV. MONSIGNOR NORMAN P. JR.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BOLDUC, REV. MONSIGNOR NORMAN P. JR.

block.p: BOLDUC-Rev. Monsignor Norman P. Jr., Chancellor of Manchester, NH Diocese, by accident September 30th in New Hampton, NH. Son of Norman & Cecile Bolduc Sr., Laconia, NH, brother of Richard, of Barnstead, NH, James and John, both of Laconia, NH, Karen Burke, Sanbornton, NH, Terry Roberts & Kathleen Moynihan, both of Belmont, NH. Funeral mass October 5th, 11 AM in St. Joseph Cathedral, Manchester, NH. Interment in Sacred Heart Cemetery, Laconia, NH. For info Simoneau & Lambert 603-524-1424.
